metadata.title: CVE-2021-33623 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The trim-newlines package before 3.0.1 and 4.x before 4.0.1 for Node.js hasan issue related to regular expression denial-of-service (ReDoS) for the.end() method.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33623` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-trim-newlines - 1.0.0-1ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-trim-newlines package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-1ubuntu0.18.04.1').
